text: Va pajomʙare ʙa suji Bani Isroil ast, ki [ʙa onon megujad]: "Man az suji Parvardigoraton ʙaroi sumo nisonae ovardaam: Man az gil ʙarojaton [cize] ʙa sakli parranda mesozam; on goh dar on medamam va ʙa farmoni Alloh taolo [on gili ʙecon taʙdil ʙa] parrandae mesavad; va [hamcunin] ʙa farmoni Alloh taolo kuri modarzod va muʙtalojon ʙa pesiro ʙehʙudi meʙaxsam va murdagonro zinda mekunam va az on ci mexured va dar xonahojaton zaxira mekuned, ʙa sumo xaʙar mediham. Musallaman, agar imon dosta ʙosed, dar inho nisonae ʙaroi sumost [ki nuʙuvvatamro ʙovar kuned]
